review_data.title: Bin regelmässig dort. Kann absolut nicht klagen.
review_data.content: Optimaler Service, super Drinks gutes Essen. Unkompliziert und schnell. Günstig angenehmes Anbiente saubere Toiletten..

review_data.title: Très sympa!
review_data.content: Bar très sympa et connu dans Zürich. Parfait pour un afterwork. Testé la Flammenküche, elle est excellente ! Ambiance cozy.

review_data.title: Cooles Ambiente, super Drinkts

review_data.title: Bar for bankers
review_data.content: Like to take few drinks? Here you can meet the bankers (men and women) and their clients havind a drink afterwork. Very popular. Seating inside or outside. Nice!!!

review_data.title: friendly place, usually for lunch or dink in a quite place at night
review_data.content: Simple place with simple entree and cold cuts. Usually a place where the bankers meet at lunch, and after 5pm. Nice service

review_data.title: Afterwork
review_data.content: Great afterwork or lunchplace! Very central and friendly stuff. Celebrate ones my boyfriends birthday and they helped me very much with the organisation.

review_data.title: Very disappointing

review_data.title: Very Pleasant Bar
review_data.content: We happened upon this bar and took a break from shopping. Great atmosphere but the most impressive thing was the amazing staff that was very friendly and super attentive.

review_data.title: erster stock ; klein aber oho

review_data.title: Great and Cool Location ...
review_data.content: On top of the location and the interior design we enjoyed a really good Cesar Salat for Lunch. The service was pleasant and fast ... will come again.

review_data.title: Coole Bar in mitten von Zürich!

review_data.title: Nice interior, staff

review_data.title: Great bar. cafe. Super location

review_data.title: Good spot to hang out
review_data.content: Bar with mostly youngish crowd from nearby financial institutions, perfect place if you want to get a feel about the upcoming gnomes of Zurich.

review_data.title: Hier läuft alles nach Vorschrift

review_data.title: Great atmosphere and service for an after work drink

review_data.title: Perfect watering hole
review_data.content: At just a 100m from the Bahnhofstrasse and 200m from Paradeplatz this corner bar is ideally located for a short pit stop during shopping or a sundowner after work. The staff is very friendly, the prices are what the prices are in Zurich... There s...More

review_data.title: Coffee bar of Zurich's bankers
review_data.content: Atelier is a stylish café/bar where you can have drinks zip a glass of wine or an excellent cappuccino. The also have some interesting food options like cold cuts and different types of cheese.

review_data.title: Nice for a drink after work

review_data.title: Not a place for food lovers
review_data.content: This is a really stylish, cozy place with polite service and flair. Sadly, they let down on a culinary front, trying to cover up for apparent lack of prowess with far too much spice, which ruins their nicely-presented dishes.

review_data.title: A nice place for a quick coffee
review_data.content: I use to have there a coffee from time to time. The place is centrally located, next to Paradeplatz. I have never been dissapointed by the coffee or the staff. Definately will visit again.

review_data.title: Top service, great cocktails

review_data.title: nice for an afterwork drink

review_data.title: Nice Bar, good service
review_data.content: At the end of our evening city tour we visited this nice bar in the center of Zurich. We received good and friendly service.

review_data.title: Great bar in the city center
review_data.content: Great place for after work drinks. I was here with some other expats for some wine and bites. We had some nice spicy salami, served with fresh Swiss bread. Due to the crowd it is difficult to get attention from the waiters

review_data.title: Drinks ok - unfriendly staff

review_data.title: Great place for Drinks in the Evening
review_data.content: We met friends for drinks and had a great time. The staff is attentive and the setting is great. If you want more privacy you can go upstairs.

review_data.title: Nice people and lovely place

review_data.title: Super nice service
review_data.content: Just a little stop in the afternoon; good wine list by the glass, Fantastic Croque Monsieur, above all nice staff and cosy atmosphere. Worthwhile..

review_data.title: LIVELY LOVELY
review_data.content: Love this great little bar on the busy street attracting lots of well heeled bankers in the environs of Paradeplatz.... Good waiter/ress service with a smile and sense of fun; beer CHF 5.50 and glass of wine CHF 9.00 .... Check it out :)

review_data.title: Have a nice glass of wine with a snack and nice music

review_data.title: nice place for a drink with a bite

review_data.title: Great for quality wine and cold cuts/cheese
